title: Community Status concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the community status. It should be something meaningful, like a short word or an acronym

_type.title: The document type. In this case, fixed to CommunityStatus

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

_version.title: The document type version. In this case, fixed to 0.3
